metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44568 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Two heap-overflow vulnerabilities exist in openSUSE/libsolv libsolv through13 Dec 2020 in the decisionmap variable via the resolve_dependenciesfunction at src/solver.c (line 1940 & line 1995), which could cause aremote Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: libsolv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
